history.proof: hauto lq: on use: app_nil_l unfold: nat_sorted.

original: intros H. inversion H. subst. apply nat_sorted_cons_inv in H1. apply nat_sorted_Forall in H1. apply Forall_cons_inv in H1. destruct H1. auto.
